name: The Villain Wants to Live One More Day
author: 桔子很橘
content: One day, Linghu Qiang suddenly acquired the &quotVillain&#039s Counterattack&quot system and began his journey through various books. His mission was to survive, claim his rewards, and return to his original world. Being a villain was tough several times, he encountered protagonists who launched missiles right from the start to kill him, or unparalleled sword immortals who, without a word, pierced his heart with a single strike before he could cause any trouble. In short, his success rate depend
